description:
Warning: Major “Good Wife” spoiler ahead.警告：前方是《傲骨贤妻》第五季重大剧透。

Leading man Will Gardner from CBS's "The Good Wife" went out with a bang Sunday night.CBS电视台的《傲骨贤妻》男主角Will Gardner将在周日晚上播出的剧集中“砰”的一声消失。

Gardner (Josh Charles), the ensemble show’s most prominent male character, was the legal colleague, sometimes-patron and sometimes-paramour of the show’s leading female character, Alicia Florrick (Julianna Margulies).Gardner (由Josh Charles饰演)是该剧中的主要男性角色，他在剧中是一名律师，同时也是事务所的合伙人。他和剧中女主Alicia Florrick (由Julianna Margulies饰演)的关系复杂，时而是老板和下属，时而是情人关系。

Will was defending a young man against a murder charge when the man, who had been abused in jail and feared spending the rest of his life there, grabbed a security guard’s gun and began randomly firing in the crowded courtroom. He then tried to kill himself, but the gun was empty.Will在法庭上为一男青年做杀人辩护。这名男青年由于在牢里受到了虐待，更害怕在牢里度过余生，于是抢了法警的手枪，在法庭上胡乱扫射。当他准备开枪自尽的时候，发现枪里没有子弹了。

Will’s investigator Kalinda (Archie Panjabi) pushed her way past the police and found the fatally wounded Will on the courtroom floor.Will的调查员Kalinda (由Archie Panjabi饰演)拨开法庭上拥挤的人群，找到了倒在法庭上奄奄一息的Will。

Previews of the final five episodes in the show's fifth season hinted at the implications of Will’s death — professionally, for his law partner Diane Lockhart (Christine Baranski), and personally, for characters like Alicia and Kalinda.在第五季最后五集中，无论是Will的工作伙伴，还是朋友都已经暗示了他的离开。

title: 《傲骨贤妻》重大剧透：主角离开
